Articles.Content: Hi guys... This is George Stuart and i'm newbie here, today i join this community because this is nice and informative community for get information, and also best place for make new friends.
Welcome to the forum, George_Stuart. I hope you enjoy your visits.

Heya, welcome to the forum

And yup, nice chaps on this forum...definitely nicer than the average Rust player
Hello I hope you have a good time here at the forums:D
Hello. I hope you enjoy the hospitality of the community! You will have fun here.

Welcome to the forums.

I wish you a nice stay.
We are a pretty nice bunch of guys and gals. Hope you enjoy your stay, and remember that we were once all newbies!
